meanings.definition: Resembling a shark in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The sharkish fins of the car looked sleek and sharp.
meanings.sent2: Her sharkish grin made her seem fierce and determined.
meanings.sent3: The sharkish cat prowled around the room, pretending to hunt for invisible prey.
meanings.sent4: His sharkish eyes scanned the crowd, searching for any sign of danger.
meanings.sent5: The sharkish shadow of the tree made it look like a predator waiting to strike.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of a shark.
meanings.sent1: The sharkish behavior of the student in the pool surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The new car had a sharkish design that made it stand out on the road.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his sharkish appetite could rival that of a real shark.
meanings.sent4: The sharkish instincts of the detective helped him solve the case quickly.
meanings.sent5: The sharkish speed of the athlete in the water was unmatched by any competitor.
